task_summary: The robot is instructed to reach a towel. The episode comprises a sequence in which the arm detects, approaches, and aligns with a towel on the workspace. No grasp or manipulation is observed; the sequence demonstrates a successful reaching behavior constrained to precise positioning.

task_long_description.overview: This episode demonstrates a robotic manipulator tasked with reaching a towel laid out on a workspace. The scene centers around the robot arm, a pink towel on green matting, and no extraneous clutter. The robot employs visual detection, localization, and precise movement to fulfill the instruction. The process prioritizes perceiving and aligning, with no grasp evident from the frames. The episode focuses on positioning, with tolerance consistent with fine alignment, and includes recovery for initial perception failure.
preconditions: Towel is placed flat within workspace
No other objects obstruct the workspace
stepwise_plan: Scan workspace if towel is not visible
success_criteria: Robot end effector is positioned above and aligned with the towel
failure_and_recovery: Perception failure: scan workspace up to 3 times
task_long_description.termination: Tree terminates when the arm is at the towel position, tolerance met, no manipulation required.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is visible in the workspace
Scans the workspace for the towel with up to 3 raster attempts
Performs detection and localization of the towel
Moves the arm above the towel at a safe offset
Approaches and aligns the arm with the towel target precisely
Confirms the arm is positioned at the towel

failure_modes: Towel not detected due to perception error
recovery_strategy: Raster scan for up to 3 attempts
Abort if misalignment persists after approach
assumptions: No grasp or manipulation observed: despite common interpretations of 'reach', the frames indicate positioning only.
Instruction does not mention contacting or grasping towel; grounding strictly in frames.
Towel assumed to be stationary and unoccluded throughout.
Workspace is uncluttered, enabling clear localization.

expected_success_criteria: Robot is above towel, within tight 5mm tolerance, verified by IsAt condition
